snippet: Layers of deceit pervade the life of a stay-at-home mom in Luxembourg in “The Expats,” a novel from Chris Pavone.
abstract: Janet Maslin reviews book The Expats by Chris Pavone.
lead_paragraph: Layers of deceit pervade the life of a stay-at-home mom in Luxembourg in “The Expats,” a novel from Chris Pavone.

headline.seo: ‘The Expats,’ a Thriller by Chris Pavone
headline.main: Just a Mom With Play Dates (and a Beretta)
